content.p: Accessible language learning for everyone Build your skills and find your voice at the University of Nottingham. The evening class programme is open to all - students, staff and members of the public. Our next programme of evening classes will begin in October 2024. Any questions? Contact us about evening classes at evening-languageclasses@nottingham.ac.uk 12 languages from beginners' to advanced Friendly staff, accessible teaching Enrolment for the autumn term of classes has now closed. evening-languageclasses@nottingham.ac.uk
